content.text: Class 10 Science Exam Analysis 2026: Today's Paper Review

The Class 10 Science board paper held on February 25, 2026, was a balanced mix of direct theory and application-based questions. While Physics numericals were slightly tricky, Biology and Chemistry sections were largely based on NCERT examples. Our experts have analyzed Set-1, Set-2, and Set-3 to provide the most accurate answer key.
Download Class 10 Science Question Paper 2026 PDF
Class 10 Science Answer Key & Solved Paper 2026
Use the link below to download the step-by-step solutions for the Science paper. This PDF includes answers for Section A (MCQs), Section B, C, D, and the Case-Study based questions in Section E.

content.question: Where can I find the Class 10 Science Board Paper Answer 2026?
content.answer: You can download the verified answer key for all sets (Set 1) right here on this page. Our team has provided detailed explanations for all Physics, Chemistry, and Biology questions.

content.question: Was the Science 2026 paper hard?
content.answer: Overall, the paper was 'Moderate'. Most students found the Physics section to be the most time-consuming, while Biology was the easiest scoring section.
